title: Remove a recipient from clr.fund
description: Someone requested to remove a recipient from clr.fund

descriptions: Select this if you think the recipient does not comply with the required criteria and should be removed.
Select this if you think the recipient complies with the required criteria and should not be removed.

question: Does the recipient comply with the required criteria?

columns.label: Name
columns.description: Commonly recognizable name of the recipient.

columns.label: ETH Address
columns.description: The ETH address where the recipient will receive funds. Should be verifiably controlled by the recipient.

columns.label: Logo / Banner image
columns.description: Recipient logo / banner image - maximum size of 400KB

columns.label: Description
columns.description: A succinct description of the recipient and how it is a public good that benefits the Ethereum Ecosystem. URIs to additional content are allowed. Should include verifiable proof of the receiving address.

columns.label: ENS Name (Optional)
columns.description: The recipient's ENS name. Should be verifiably controlled by the recipient. Records resolved from this ENS name may be used for extra details on profiles or for receiving addresses on different networks.
